about_the_game:
The demo for Chaos Chain allows you to try out the life of a freelancer in the Slade City sprawl!


Features
  • Try out the game using the "civic" character background! (The full game has 7 backgrounds to play as!)
  • Play until your character reaches rank 7! (Rank 35 is the max in the full game!)
  • Access to all gameplay content that build 1.36.2 (2/4/24) has to offer! (A few hours of the main quest and over 30 side quests!)
  • Autosaves and the ability to sleep and save! (Buy the full version to save anywhere and anytime using memory chips!)
  • Save transfer capability (You can move your saves from the demo into the main game's directory if you end up buying it to continue where you left off!)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
  • Additional Notes: *STEAM CONTROLLERS WORK BY DEFAULT - Enable additional gamepad/controller support by opening the gamepad.txt file in the install directory and setting the gamepad value to "1".*
